mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtStmp Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_NO , FREE_GIFT_TURN , MBR_NO , STMP_DT , EVT_PARTCPTN_SN , APL_TURN , PARTCPTN_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_STMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_NO = #{evtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FREE_GIFT_TURN = #{freeGiftTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STMP_DT = #{stmpDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
